definition: a breed of horse/variant of 歡|欢[huan1]
to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Li and Lin became quarrelsome lovers.
Then again, it's always been a mixed relationship between the two.
sentences.chinese: 总之，两国一直都是一对欢喜冤家。

sentences.english: After many years, the two have met did not know, has become a joy enemy.
sentences.chinese: 多年后，两人见面已不相识，却成了一对欢喜冤家。

definition: lit. don't fight, won't make friends (idiom); an exchange of blows may lead to friendship/no discord, no concord
lit. green plums and hobby-horse (idiom)/fig. innocent children's games/childhood sweethearts/a couple who grew up as childhood friends
enemy/foe/(in opera) sweetheart or destined love
talented man and beautiful woman/ideal couple
destiny will make enemies meet (idiom)/(often said about lovers who have a disagreement)
pinyin: bu4 shi4 yuan1 jia1 bu4 ju4 tou2

definition: talented man and beautiful woman/ideal couple
lit. golden boys and jade maidens (idiom)/attendants of the Daoist immortals/fig. lovely young children/a golden couple/(of a couple who are in the public eye) a lovely young couple
love is more solid than gold (idiom)
to be kind and love one another (idiom); bound by deep emotions
